slide_content_0: Download Videoleap Android, and find out how creativity easily comes with video! Whether you want to make artistic Hollywood-worthy movies or just want to share memories and moments with your friends, Videoleap apk is a revolutionary video editor, just for you. Pros will take advantage of powerful high-end editing features, amateurs will enjoy cutting and arranging clips in a simple, intuitive and mobile way. Now download the video leap android app to start creating amazing videos right away.
slide_content_1:
Mix together videos and images to create double exposures and artistic aspects.
Layer-based editing! Add videos, effects, text, images, then change the order as you want.
Customize layers with transform, layer, and blend modes.
Apply smooth cinematic transitions to your clips.
slide_content_2:
Keyframe animations
Composition with green screen / chroma key.
Adjust clips to format. Put the clips on a white or colored canvas.
Non-destructive editing.
No limit to undo / restore
Frame-by-frame precision with an intuitive zoomed timeline

As much Snapchat for Android has its own effects so well known to the general public, the special effects of Videoleap APK are as follows:
Prism, blur, colorfly, pixelation, chromatic aberration and more!
Text: variety of fonts, emojis, shadows, colors, opacity and blending.
Unique and adjustable filters for every moment.
slide_content_3:
Editing clips: trim, split, duplicate, flip, mirror, transform.
Color Correction: Adjust brightness, contrast, saturation and more.
Over 100 sound effects!
Control audio volume and apply equalizer presets.
Change aspect ratio and adjust clips automatically.
Customize the color of your background.
slide_content_4:
A stock of in-app footage, including videos and green screen overlays.
Useful mini-tutorials in each feature.
Automatic registration of projects. You work them when and where you want.
Preview your work in full screen.
